programme.title: Shin chan Spin-off vol.1 Aliens vs. Shinnosuke
programme.desc: Shinnosuke and companions awaken after 100 years of hibernation. Soon, they realise their last shared memory is a mall parking lot, and the group collaborates to get back to Earth.

programme.title: Shin chan Spin-off vol.1 Aliens vs. Shinnosuke
programme.desc: Shinnosuke and Ellen witness a small ship's sudden explosion, questioning the motive. Meanwhile, Hiroshi discovers a mysterious door.

programme.title: Shin chan Spin-off vol.1 Aliens vs. Shinnosuke
programme.desc: When Hiroshi retrieves a 100-year-old Soda Gold bottle, hungry Shinnosuke attempts to drink it. Later, they discover a pillar of sweet, jelly-like food.

programme.desc: When Micchi and Yoshirin miss roll call, Shinnosuke and the others go looking for them. However, they discover that the number of capsules does not correspond to the number of people on board.

programme.title: Shin chan Spin-off vol.1 Aliens vs. Shinnosuke

programme.title: Shin chan Spin-off vol.1 Aliens vs. Shinnosuke

programme.title: Shin chan Spin-off vol.1 Aliens vs. Shinnosuke

programme.title: Shin chan Spin-off vol.1 Aliens vs. Shinnosuke
